TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 亲族薹草 ( 原变种) qin zu tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Leaf blades 2–3 mm wide. Female glumes broadly ovate, ca. 1 mm. Utricles ca. 2.5 mm. Fl. and fr. Aug–Oct.
treatment.distribution: ● Forests, ditch sides, riversides; ca. 1500 m. Jiangxi, Sichuan, Yunnan (Qingfeng Shan).
